unnormalised: **Local Kirana Store Math: Where 2+2 Never Equals 4 (and Other Financial Adventures)**
normalised: **local kirana store math: where two plus two never equals four (and other financial adventures)**

unnormalised: Folks, mhaka sangta, tumche sobit kirana store-ant errands choloiche mhonnche shopping korun choloiche nhoi, punn advanced mathematics, zaka theatrical performance-an ruchik korunk zata tech bhaxen. Tumche calculators visarun vocha, kiteak abacus hea lokam kodden asat.
normalised: lokanno, mhaka sangtat, tumchea neighborhood kirana store-ak dhava-dhavi korop mhollear shopping korpacho poros advanced mathematics, ek theatrical performance-achi ruch gheun. tumchi calculators visrun vocha, kiteak abacus hea lokam kodden borench strong asa.

unnormalised: Mhunn Sharmaji-chea dukana, mhaka 'atta' (pito) ani 'dal' (daal) zai aslem. Price board-an attachem kimot Rs. 35/kg mhunn sangllem. Dal? Rs. 80/kg. “Sharmaji, ek kilo atta ani aadha kilo dal de do (Sharmaji, mhaka ek kilo atta ani aadha kilo dal di),” hanvem mhonnlem, ek zobabdari ghog mhonn zannoun.
normalised: mhunnun, hanv kal sharmaji-chea dukanaant 'atta' (pith) ani 'dal' (daal) haddak gel’lo. price board-an khuxalkayen sanglam ki atta rupee thirty five per kilogram. dal? ek cool rupee eighty per kilogram. "sharmaji, ek kilo atta aur aadha kilo dal de do (sharmaji, mhaka ek kilogram atta ani aadha kilo dal di)," mhunn hanvem sanglem, ek zodabdhar adult-i bhaxen mhaka dislem.

unnormalised: Sharmaji, ek purnn magica-chem grace gheun, vostu zokli ani sangli, “Atta Rs. 40, dal Rs. 50. Total, Rs. 90 beta (Rs. 90, putra).”
normalised: sharmaji, ek seasoned magician-achi kripa gheun, vostu zokhli ani magir zahir kelem, "atta rupee forty, dal rupee fifty. total, rupee ninety beta (rupee ninety, put).”

unnormalised: Ata, hanv Einstein nhoi, punn mhaka mahit asa ki 35 + 40 90 zai na. Hanvem tankam xantiyen sangllem. Sharmaji mhojem disa pollelem koxen hanvem tankam mhonnlem tankam aple prize-winning gay vikunk zata.
normalised: atanch, hanv einstein nhoi, punn mhaka khobor asa ki thirty five plus forty ninety zaunk favona. hanvem mhotvenan sarkhi chuk dakhoili. sharmaji mhaka oxem polloilo mhunnlear hanvem taka prize-winning gai vikpacho suchoilem.

unnormalised: "Beta, 'atta' Rs. 35 punn 'yeh wala atta' (hea attak) special asa. Taka extra 'ashirwad' (ashirvad) asa mhunn Rs. 40. Ani 'dal' tumak 'aadha kilo' (ardhem kilo) zai, punn 'aadha kilo' ek 'pauwa' -itlem komi asa mhunn kimot double, Rs. 50, Samjhe? (Somzon ailem?)” Tannem ek saint-achem xantponn gheun mhaka algebra ek monkey-k somzon dita tech bhaxen sangllem.
normalised: "beta, 'atta' rupee thirty five punn 'yeh wala atta' (hem atta) special asa. taka extra 'ashirwad' (axirvad) asa mhunn rupee forty. ani 'dal' tuka 'aadha kilo' (aadha kilogram) zai, punn 'aadha kilo' ek 'pauwa'-chem komi asa mhunn price double, rupee fifty, samjhe? (kallak ailem?)” tannem eka saint-an eka monkey-ak algebra sangta te bhaxen dhiran uktear kelem.

unnormalised: Hanv, of course, 'samjhe' (somzon ailem). Mhaka somzon ailem ki logic dukhan soddlam, zanv ek competitor kirana store ugddam. Punn Sharmaji-chea sangata argue korunk mhonnche gravity-chea sangata argue korunk. Tumi point zinkunk xaktat, punn tumi nimanne tumchem tonddacher poddtat.
normalised: hanv, of course, 'samjhe' (kallak ailem). mhaka kallak ailem ki logic dukanaantlean bhair sorun gelelem, rival kirana store ugddak zata. punn sharmaji kodden zoghddop mhollear gravity kodden zoghddop. tumka ek point jitunk xakta, punn tumchea tonddar poddtelim.

unnormalised: Ani boreantli vost? Change. Hanvem tankam ek Rs. 100-chem note dilem. Tannem apnna kaixa drawer-ant rummage kelem, thodde coins bhair kadle, ani sangllem, "Rs. 5 change, beta.” Hanv kasam karta, attam kamit kamit Rs. 15 worth-anche coins asle. Punn konn asa hanv kirana store finance-chea master-ak prost korunk?
normalised: ani soglem borem? change. hanvem taka ek rupee hundred-achi note dili. tannem tachea cash drawer-ant rummaging kelem, thodde coins bhair kaddlem, ani zahir kelem, "rupee five change, beta.” hanv xapoth gheun sangta, tachea hatant kamit kamit rupee fifteen poriant coins asle. punn konn hanv kirana store finance-ache master-ak prosn korpak?

unnormalised: Mhunn, tumi tumche local kirana store-ant vochchon, ek yad dovrunk: cash ghevn vocha (bhov), ek flexible understanding mathematics-achem, ani ek bore bhaxen sensachem humor. Kiteak kirana store-ant, shopping mhonnche ek transaction nhoi, te ek experience. Ani experience-an, mhaka mhonnunk asa creative accounting-ache crash course. Tumi tor ek borem bargain zoddunk xaktat, je bhaxen "extra 'ashirwad' " attak.
normalised: mhunnun, tumchi next time tumchea local kirana store-ak vochot thodoch, yaad dovrat: cash gheun vocha (chodd), mathematics-acho ek flexible somzop ani ek borea humor-achi bhovna. kiteak kirana store-ant, shopping mhunnlear fokot transaction nhoi, ti ek experience asa. ani experience mhunnlear, ek creative accounting-acho crash course. tumka ek borem bargain mellunk xakta, zoxem "extra 'ashirwad' " atta.
